PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-09291998-05-280,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA of its statutory powers to take some 11.9 hectares of land on GITANYOW INDIAN RESERVE NO. 1 for highway purposes or other works of public utility, and (b) authorizing the transfer of those lands to the Province for those purposes, in lieu of their expropriation.
Attachments
